caption.title: Cytotoxic effect of plant leaves extracts (%).
caption.p: In the figure different lower case letters (a, b, c, d, e, x, y, z, w, v) in the bars indicates significant differences among means (P˂0.05). The blue and red colour bars indicate the aqueous and 70% ethanolic extracts, respectively. X-axis denotes the sample name and Y-axis denotes percentage (%) of toxicity of the plants leaves extracts towards PBMC at the dose of 10μl.
